description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the side and rear of existing back addition, following the demolition of existing single storey side extension; erection of a rear extension at first floor level, over part of the proposed single storey rear extension; installation of a rooflight on top of the main flat roof, re-sizing and replacement of an existing window to the rear elevation at roof level; installation of a rooflight on top of the flat roof, replacement of an existing window to the rear elevation, and re-sizing and replacement of an existing window to the side elevation of second floor back addition; installation of new window, and replacement of an existing window with a new window to the side elevation of first floor back addition; installation of an air conditioning condenser unit, on top of the flat roof of proposed single storey rear extension; excavation of part of the front and rear gardens to form lightwells, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement; alterations to the external front facade to include repainting and making good existing brickwork, render and stucco areas.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
